text: Andrey Olegovich Ashmarin (; born 12 February 1984) is a Russian badminton player. He became the runner-up of 2013 Russian Open in men's doubles event with his partner Vitaly Durkin. == Achievements == === BWF Grand Prix === The BWF Grand Prix has two level such as Grand Prix and Grand Prix Gold. It is a series of badminton tournaments, sanctioned by Badminton World Federation (BWF) since 2007.
